scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run copy-env
scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.copy-env: cp server/.env.example server/.env && echo '.env copied ✅' || echo '⚠️ .env already exists, skipping...'
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
